import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useApp } from '../context/AppContext'; import { ArrowLeft, TrendingUp, TrendingDown, MessageCircle, Share2, Bell, Plus } from 'lucide-react'; import { generateChartData } from '../data/mockData'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, BarChart, Bar } from 'recharts'; const StockDetailScreen: React.FC = () => { const { state, dispatch } = useApp(); const [selectedTimeframe, setSelectedTimeframe] = useState('1M'); const stock = state.currentStock; if (!stock) { return (

No stock selected

); } const chartData = generateChartData(30); const timeframes = ['1D', '1W', '1M', '3M', '1Y', '5Y']; const handleBack = () => { dispatch({ type: 'SET_SCREEN', payload: 'home' }); }; const handleAddToWatchlist = () => { dispatch({ type: 'ADD_TO_WATCHLIST', payload: stock }); }; return (
{/* Header */}

{stock.symbol}

{stock.name}

${stock.price}
0 ? 'positive-change' : stock.changePercent < 0 ? 'negative-change' : 'neutral-change' }`}> {stock.changePercent > 0 ? : } {stock.changePercent > 0 ? '+' : ''}{stock.change} ({stock.changePercent > 0 ? '+' : ''}{stock.changePercent.toFixed(2)}%)
Market Cap
{stock.marketCap}
{/* Match Analysis */}

Match Analysis

{stock.matchPercentage}%

Why this matches you:

    {stock.matchReasons.map((reason, index) => (
  • {reason}
    • ))}
{/* Chart Section */}

{/* AI Insights */}

AI Insights

Recent Movement Analysis

{stock.symbol} has shown strong momentum in the past week, driven by positive earnings expectations and sector rotation into {stock.sector.toLowerCase()} stocks.

Key Events

  • • Upcoming earnings report on {new Date(Date.now() + 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toLocaleDateString()}
  • • New product launch expected next quarter
  • • Analyst upgrades from major firms
{/* Sentiment Analysis */}

Market Sentiment

Positive News 65%
Neutral News 25%
Negative News 10%

{post.upvotes - post.downvotes} {new Date(post.timestamp).toLocaleDateString()}
))}

); }; export default StockDetailScreen;
